data.name: World of Warships - Huanghe Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Huanghe is a Pan-Asian cruiser that preserves many traits of her British origins. Little wonder, as in the reality this ship began her combat life in the Royal Navy. Like most British cruisers, Huanghe carries a rich array of consumables. In addition to the standard Damage Control Party and Smoke Generator consumables, players can install Hydroacoustic Search, or the Torpedo Reload Booster consumable, unusual for cruisers. The latter enables the ship to fire several torpedo attacks very quickly.

Advantages:

  • Six rapid-fire 152 mm guns with nice shell ballistics and velocity.
  • Three torpedoes at each boardside. Torpedo range — 8 km.
  • Torpedo Reload Booster consumable, not very typical for cruisers.
  • Adequate AA defense for a ship of this tier.
  • Extra credits per battle and 50% more XP provided by the camouflage.

Contents of this bundle:

  • Huanghe, Tier VI Pan-Asian Cruiser;
  • Steam memorable flag;
  • slot.

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will receive 2,231 doubloons as compensation.

data.short_description: Huanghe is a Pan-Asian cruiser that preserves many traits of her British origins. Little wonder, as in the reality this ship began her combat life in the Royal Navy. Like most British cruisers, Huanghe carries a rich array of consumables.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
